attributes.action: Cut down on aircraft and matritime pollution by returning British troops to British shores
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government wants to cut down on aircraft and maritime pollution fine start by bringing all out troops home

Kill two birds with one stone. 

1) Stop the massive pollution caused by troop transport and support.

2) Stop being a global policeman and look to our own shores first and foremost above everything else.

Keep British Troops in Britain instead of polluting the world

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
